name: Marriott Swindon Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I booked this hotel as a D+BB weekend rate. It was cerainly worth every penny we paid.
reviews.title: Great deal, fun stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The dinner was a good deal - we were able to order anything on the overpriced menu, but it was already included in the package, which was a steal. The service at dinner was poor, but we suspect it was our waitress' first night on the job and the other staff were just bothered by us asking for help. That and the man at reception the second day we stayed were the only purely negative points of our stay.
reviews.title: Good Value

likes.liked: — Nice hotel, friendly staff, good location for touring the area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was very nice and the pool was good with a nice hot tub. The changing facilities left a little to be desired, but were overall acceptable.
reviews.title: first class stay

reviews.text: The breakfast buffet was excellent and might well have been the highlight of this getaway!
reviews.title: great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On the whole, it was a nice little getaway - just a short trip to get out of Bristol for a day or two. It was worth every penny, but if we had paid full price, we would have expected a bit more.
reviews.title: nice hotel friendly staff

likes.liked: — good quality room with comfortable beds

reviews.text: We stayed at the Marriott Swindon en route to Southampton and we used Marriott Rewards to pay for the stay. It is very easy to get to from wherever your coming from. We were upgraded to a superior room which are very modern with excellent beds and a clean, contemporary bathroom with rather nice complimentary toiletries. Check in was very quick by friendly, courteous staff and we were in our room within five minutes.
reviews.title: Good Hotel In A Convenient Location

reviews.text: The swimming pool and changing facilities are very good, although I should imagine that this could get a bit crowded over the weekend.
reviews.title: Small boxy room

likes.disliked: — small, boxy room with derailing curtains

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast wasn't included in our package and was very good but ridiculously over priced.
reviews.title: Okay, but caution

likes.liked: — Breakfast and the dining room staff
likes.disliked: — The check-out experience and the size of the room

reviews.text: We use Marriott hotels a lot due to their consistency and this was no exception.
reviews.title: Such a pity

likes.liked: — The Chats bar staff and food

reviews.text: Was abit disappointed with the standard of this marriott. The room we were given was small and curtain slightly derailing! Breakfast was ok, the presentation could have been done better.
reviews.title: Wondeful staff- bedrooms need a revamp!

likes.disliked: — Rooms needed updating in our case

reviews.text: We stayed here Good Friday and Saturday over easter. Ate in restaurant both nights v good , breakfast v good. Room spacious and clean. Staff v polite. Pool small but fine ! Activiries for kids as it was easter which was a bonus.
reviews.title: Lovely easter break !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: hotel was empty front staff were extremely pleasant and helpful. we were upgraded to a superior room which was very nice and we had a lovely big bed and dressing gowns.
reviews.title: lovely hotel but too warm for us

reviews.text: the hotel was extremely warm for time of year and the room was no exception. you cant open any windows for H & S reasons apparently and therefore we had to have air con all night which is very noisy. breakfast was excellent but again we had to move out of resteraunt due to it being very hot and stuffy. staff said heating was on all the time and were very sorry and said they would of provided us with a fan if required. pool was also out of action which was a shame
reviews.title: Great location
Good value at weekends and very nice hotel
reviews.text: I have stayed in the Marriott for about 3 months and found it to be a great location for the old town. It takes about 10 minutes to walk there. The food is OK but with so many other restaurants around I didn't eat there that much (typically expensive for what you get). The rooms were a good size and had comfortable beds. So much so you could even by them!!

The staff were very helpful and they responded quickly to any request. The biggest problem with the hotel was the wireless Internet - lot's of my colleagues and I found it unreliable at times. The hotel provided you with a code but I found that I often had to try many codes before I could get access.
reviews.title: Mixed bag - check your bill for overcharging!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose the Swindon Marriott for a weekend break because it isn't too far to travel and they were offering a great summer deal of £77 per room per night for bed and breakfast AND dinner on the first night.
reviews.title: Great value and very comfortable

likes.liked: — Comfort of the rooms and the pleasantness of the staff
likes.disliked: — the over sensitive (and over priced) minibar

reviews.text: We initially went via the hotel's website but then phoned up to double check on the room availability because we wanted a twin room with two doubles. The beds and pillows were very comfortable and there were decent sized towels in the bathroom which is unusual these days. There was a full sized bath to have a good soak in after a swim in the excellent pool.
reviews.title: Fair hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were very attentive and efficient throughout the hotel and we were made to feel like valued guests rather than a number throughout our stay.
reviews.title: Great night at the Charity Ball

likes.disliked: — My room was at the end of the corridor

reviews.text: If you are on a package including dinner you choose any starter, main course and dessert from the menu without any financial limit. You only pay extra for drinks and additional courses (if you have room).
reviews.title: Clean, tidy and safe choice

likes.liked: — excellent value for sparkling clean accommodation

reviews.text: Breakfast was excellent quality and quantity although better on the Saturday than the Sunday
reviews.title: Great Service at the Marriott

description: Newly opened Garden Patio area just outside the Bar and Restaurant, come and enjoy some food and drink in while soaking up some sun.Free WiFi internet is available in our Chat Bar, Source Restaurant and Garden patio areas.
